thread.section_title: Libertel Gare du Nord Suede - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very comfortable hotel but tricky neighbourhood
thread.title_full: Very comfortable hotel but tricky neighbourhood - Review of Libertel Gare du Nord Suede, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alziku
title: Very comfortable hotel but tricky neighbourhood
text:
Very nice facilities and staff. Tiny but very well organized.
Many errant people in the neighbourhood, didn't feel very secure when leaving the hotel, specially at the end of the day. Noted the absence of police in the streets.
